xin_fixed_navbar_navigation_details: The fixed layout has a fixed top bar and navigation menu
xin_fixed_footer_details: The fixed footer has a fixed navbar, navigation menu and footer only content section is scrollable to user.
xin_boxed_layout_details: The boxed layout has a padding around the main wrapper as well as a background can be applied to it and all your content will be centered with the background flowing around it.
xin_dark_layout_details: The dark layout has a dark color navbar, navigation menu and footer.
xin_theme_compact_menu_details: Default vertical menu is full width. You may want change that behavior and make the menu compact at page level or at template level. You can experience compact menu in left side menu.
xin_theme_flipped_menu_details: Change navigation menu position to right with the help of flipped navigation menu options. RTL layout has default flipped navigation menu.
xin_theme_right_side_icons_details: Default position of top level menu items icon position is left, it can be changed to right side with the help of navigation right side icon options. Check navigation with right side icons in navigation menu.
xin_theme_bordered_menu_details: Bordered navigation separate first level of main navigation by adding border. You can check bordered navigation on left side navigation menu.
xin_theme_set_form_design: Set form input design - examples are given below

xin_theme_set_bg_clr_statistics_cards: Set background color for statistics cards.
xin_theme_set_employee_cards: Set employee cards for employee directory page.
xin_theme_simple_employee_cards_box_shad: Simple Employee Cards with Shadow Variant
xin_theme_set_employee_card_border_clr_n: Note: This will work for Simple Employee Cards with Border option only.
xin_org_chart_export_details: Enable the export button for orgchart. Export Chart will be an image
xin_success_thm_export_chart: The export chart field is required.
xin_org_chart_zoom_details: Users could zoomin/zoomout the orgchart by mouse wheel if they enable this option.
xin_org_chart_pan_details: Users could pan the orgchart by mouse drag&drop if they enable this option.
xin_error_thm_export_file_title_field: The export file title field is required.
xin_org_chart_export_file_title_details: Set export file title - you can also add your company name here.
xin_error_employee_login_id_field: The employee login field is required.
xin_enable_auth_bg_imgs_details: If you enable this option then background image will show for Login page, Forgot password page and Lock User page.
xin_error_sys_ip_address_field: The system ip address field is required.
xin_setting_sys_ip_address_details: If you add your system ip address then employee will be able to clock in and out only from office. If you add wrong system ip then your workers will not able to clock in and out.
xin_setting_ip_restriction_details: If enabled then employee will be able to clock in and out only from office.
xin_setting_google_maps_api_key_details: It helps you to get an employee clock-in and clock-out location.
xin_error_gmap_field: The google maps api key field is required.
xin_prjct_detail_eagle_eye_view: Eagle's Eye View Of Project Status
xin_setting_module_details: In order to make %s user interface much simpler to use for you and your employees you can select the purpose of using this application for your company. This will disable unwanted modules and provide you a better user experience.
xin_setting_module_awards_details: You can give your employees different awards in different times as you organization see fit. Giving an employee award is very easy.
xin_setting_module_inquiry_details: Creating a new ticket in the system is also very easy. You can at a go - add all related information of a ticket.
xin_setting_module_training_details: Training is a common aspect of all organization. Therefore to track and update training and related operations - %s facilitates with Training Modules. You can create training and assign your employees for training.
xin_setting_module_orgchart_details: An organizational chart is a diagram that shows the structure of an organization and the relationships and relative ranks of its parts and positions/jobs.
xin_setting_module_mlanguage_details: To add a language go to languages/ from top menu. When you add any language then go to application/language/ folder and open your desired language folder and then change the text into other desired language.
xin_setting_module_fmanager_details: A good solution for managing files and folders for developers who can't access their site over SSH or FTP. Access your files anywhere through self-hosted secure storage, file backup and sharing for your photos, videos, files and more. Upload and download large files for easy sharing.
xin_setting_module_performance_details: You can set new performance for designations and employees in the company.
xin_setting_module_travels_details: You can easily add new Travel in the system. The form is elaborate with all possible information you might need to add for a new Travel.
xin_setting_module_recruitment_details: Recruitment is the most vital part of %s. Job opening Information, job functions, requirements and skills information and staffing status.
xin_acc_accounting_details: Accounting is the process of systematically recording, measuring, and communicating information about financial transactions.
xin_error_event_title_field: The event title field is required.
xin_error_event_date_field: The event date field is required.
xin_error_event_time_field: The event time field is required.
xin_error_event_date_current_date: The event date field should be greater than current date.
xin_error_meeting_title_field: The meeting title field is required.
xin_error_meeting_date_field: The meeting date field is required.
xin_error_meeting_time_field: The meeting time field is required.
xin_error_meeting_date_current_date: The meeting date field should be greater than current date.
xin_hr_events_meetings_details: Event & meetings system is a simple and advanced script. It is suitable for any one who wants to create event based functionality to their system. You can easily manage your events and meetings so they can be added, updated and deleted in an easy way. All events and meetings will be showing in a calendar with time.
xin_error_tracking_type_field: The goal type field is required.
xin_error_target_achiement_field: The target achiement field is required.
xin_hr_goal_module_details: You can set up reminds so that you never forget to maintain those daily habits that lead to bigger goal achievement. Simply pick a goal, set a target by inputting a goal value or a certain date and then specify the action you need to do to turn it into a habit.
xin_hr_report_error_month_field: The report month & year field is required.
xin_setting_module_project_details: Projects Management is an important feature every company needs to accomplish various projects. Projects has been provided in %s to facilitate admins and employees to create, track, and discuss in between various projects.
xin_setting_module_task_details: Task Management is an important feature every company needs to accomplish various task. Task has been provided in %s to facilitate admins and employees to create, track, and discuss in between various tasks.
xin_setting_module_assets_details: Keep a track of your organizations assets and assign them to employees. Store and maintain comprehensive asset information and employees can raise requests to replace or repair assets which have stopped working.
xin_hr_date_format_error: Date format is incorrect. It Should be Year-Month-Day
xin_employee_error_date_of_birth: The date of birth field is required.
xin_hr_alpha_numeric_error: Only letters and numbers are allowed, like DN123 or 123 or DN

xin_hr_chat_box_details: %s Chat Application is quite hot and easy-to-use for internal communication. Chat immediately as you start your work day. You can use private messages for direct, one-on-one communication.

xin_hr_booking_details: Booking module is very useful in hr system, with the help of this module you can add appointments, ads in the system. And can view all bookings in a calendar.

xin_hrsale_paid_salaries_account_balance: Total paid salaries, account balance, travel expense and other expenses.
xin_hrsale_login_page_options_error_fiel: The login page option field is required.
xin_hrsale_hr_system_login_panel: HRSALE provides you with a powerful and cost-effective HR platform to ensure you get the best from your employees and managers. HRSALE is a timely solution to upgrade and modernize your HR team to make it more efficient and consolidate your employee information into one intuitive HR system.

xin_enable_geolocation_ssl_details: If you have installed ssl on your server then you can enable this option, because you can easily get the employee clock-in/out location in the system.
xin_field_name_lowercase_error: Use only small letters for name field.
xin_role_note1: 1: If you enable the module for an employee, it means employee will only see their related record of assigned module.
xin_role_note2: 2: If you check for a company view, it means employee will be able to see all record of his/her company of assigned module.
xin_payroll_title_details: Payroll is the most vital part of our %s. A very intelligent and robust payroll management is provided so that you do not have to worry about any aspect of your payroll management. The system will trigger and do almost everything for you.
xin_subdepartments_title_details: %s also provides easy sub departments module system, where administrator can add multiple sub departments, and under one sub department administrator can add multiple designations.

you_wont_able_revert_it: You won't be able to revert this!

match_old_pass: The current password is match with old password.
number_of_minutes_to_go_late: Number of minutes to go late
number_of_minutes_to_leave_early: Number of minutes to leave early
your_more_than_4days: You have been off for more than 4 days
computer_generated: This is a computer generated ticket and does not require a signature.
duplicate_time_meeting: The time you selected is already booked, please see the list below to reset:
your_not_selected_meeting: Your have not selected a meeting date
xin_employee_error_full_name: The full name field is required.
xin_employee_error_mobile_phone: The mobile phone field is required.
xin_employee_error_from_date: The from date field is required.
xin_employee_error_from_date_before: From date must be before a date "To date".
xin_employee_error_to_date_required: The to date field is required.
xin_employee_error_to_date_after: To date must be after a "From date" date.
xin_employee_error_document_file: The document file field is required.
xin_employee_error_document_file_mimes: The file field must be a file in the format: jpg, jpeg, pdf, png.
xin_employee_error_document_file_max: The document file cannot be larger than 1024 kilobytes.
xin_employee_error_place_of_issue: The place of issue field is required.
xin_employee_error_education_level: The education level field is required.
are_you_sure_action: Are you sure to update it?
passwork_not_same: The password and its confirm are not the same
xin_error_complaint_length: This field must be less than 255 characters
xin_setting_module_sso_details: SSO is an authentication mechanism that requires a user to log in only once with an account and password to access multiple applications in one session.
